text: In this example we can clearly see a little bit more of a lack of any kind of overlap of the current day's value area relative to the previous day's value area. So all this is telling us is that whilst price was being facilitated in one area While this doesn't necessarily indicate that we are likely to trend, it is indicating to us a market that's a little bit out of balance and there's a little bit more of an initiative being taken by either the buyers or the sellers. Again, it's important to look at one, where does the market close on these day types, but also more important is, you know, we tend to see this sort of type of play within a market that is one-time framing. But still inside the previous day's range, we tend to see the market one time framing. So again, this is giving us a little bit of a clue that whilst the market has zero overlap, we could continue to see prices move either up or down with the short term trend.
